elements.name: VSTSAccountName
elements.label: Team Services Account Name
elements.toolTip: Specify the Team Services account to use. Example: If yout account URL is https://contoso.visualstudio.com, just specify "contoso"

constraints.validationMessage: Account name must not start with https:// and must not end with visualstudio.com

elements.name: TeamProject
elements.label: Team Project
elements.toolTip: Specify the Team Project which has the deployment group defined in it

elements.name: DeploymentGroup
elements.label: Deployment Group
elements.toolTip: Specify the Deployment Group against which deployment agent will be registered

elements.name: AgentName
elements.label: Agent Name
elements.toolTip: (Optional) Specify a name for the agent. If not specified, VM name appended with "-DG" will be used

elements.name: PATToken
elements.toolTip: Enter the Personal Access Token which would be used to authenticate against Team Services account to download and configure agent

elements.name: Tags
elements.label: Tags
elements.toolTip: (Optional) Specify a comma separated list of tags which will be set on agent. Tags are case insensitive and must not be more than 256 characters long each
